mapper.select: SELECT date_format(l.update_time, '%Y%m%d') AS countTime, count( CASE WHEN l.level_type = '2' THEN 1 ELSE NULL END ) AS storeNum, count( CASE WHEN l.level_type = '1' THEN 1 ELSE NULL END ) AS vipNum FROM user_level as l left join user as u on u.id = l.user_id WHERE ( l.update_time BETWEEN #{startTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and #{endTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR} OR l.update_time BETWEEN #{relativeStartTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and #{relativeEndTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR} ) AND u.is_delete = 0 GROUP BY date_format(l.update_time, '%Y%m%d') ORDER BY date_format(l.update_time, '%Y%m%d') DESC;
